评论详情: Shirt is superintendent! Nice light weight fabric. Vivid embroidery. Loved it. Had the largest size of XXL & couldn't get it over my arms. My mom is a little smaller than me & it didn't fit her either! I'm 5'6" 230lbs 42B.. mom is 5'8" 220lbs 44D. Mom could get the shirt on but was extremely tight. Not flowy at all & hit her at waist not hips like pictures show. This shirt is not for a plus sized woman, unfortunately.. but it is super cute for anyone under a size 20!!

Not sure what this fabric is, but the photos are misleading. The material is stiff, thus not allowing the shirt to sit nicely on your physique. I love the embroidery which is why I decided to keep it, but wouldn't purchase any other colors.

评论概述: XL was a little tight, the XXL loose
评论详情: I love the embroidery on these shirts and I have  bought two of these blouses dark blue XL. It was too tight in the arms & shoulders. So I bought the XXL in white. The shoulders, bust, and arms are fine.  I have to wear an unlined bra, not lightly lined or padded, otherwise the tops would be too tight across the bust. I am 5’0” and weigh 155#.  The fabric is soft and light enough that I plan to wear it on the Panamanian Cruise. I have several styles and will review them all. The colors are true to the pictures.
The top is made with very thin material
100% rayon  love this shirt
Embroidery is pretty bright colors but in made in china

La talla es la correcta, el bordado está bonito y de muy buen acabado. Las mangas están más cortas que lo que muestra la fotografía y el material de la blusa está muy simple, débil, transparente. Yo esperaba que el material fuera un poco más resistente.
Very pretty and it fit just right.  True to size.  The material is thin.
Loved the style, but the fabric is much too sheer and see through foe an older woman.
Love it’ fit is great material is soft and lays nicely fit as expected

I like it--beautiful, coverage, embroidery is beautiful--material is nice silky but the stitching keeps it firm across the shoulder and neckline the rest is flowable.  It was big but I took it in at the shoulders.

Fits well. I like it. I got lots of compliments on it.

评论概述: Runs small you would need to go up in size
评论详情: The fabric is a nice quality. Workmanship is a good quality as well. Just go up two sizes if you want that flowing look otherwise you'll look like a stuffed tamale.
Not a good fit, it was a little bit on the small size.

This top is really pretty and the quality is very good. The cotton fabric is comfortable and I had no issues with itching from the embroidery and threads as I have in the past with other embroidered tops. It’s a nice length and covers the tush. I have not washed it yet so I’m not sure how that will go but I think it says hand wash or dry clean. ( If hand washing I suspect it would have to be VERY gently in cold water ) I generally wear small or medium (depending on style and cut ) and based on reviews I went with a medium, and it fits perfectly. (I’m 5 foot four and 128 pounds ) I’m very happy with my purchase.
The blouse is literally falling apart at the seams after only wearing it twice.
The shirt is beautiful and I love it but, every time I hand wash it all the color comes out.  If it ever got into the laundry the whole load would be ruined!
The shirt is nice and soft/silky. It is lightweight and looks good with white pants. Does need ironing. Fits loose.

The length of the shirt is very appreciated as I wear the top with fitted pants. Also the sleeves are a nice length short but enough coverage of upper arm. I like the embroidery details b/c they give the top a very feminine appearance which is what I was looking for. Fit- just right.

The only reason I gave this 4 stars instead of five is because it smelled like Tide laundry detergent when I took it out of the packaging. It didn’t look worn, but it was strange. I have to use non-scented detergents, so I was a little aggravated. I bought the white one, and it is see through; but I always have camis for that reason. It is a beautiful top that is true to size. I suggest using a fabric steamer to get wrinkles out.
Love this blouse. Just as described.
Material is awesome, threading strong. Love it!

This top has no stretch in the fabric.  I ordered a size up to accommodate my shape.  I love the color and embroidery.  I found it best to washy on delicate and hang dry after a quick shaping.  Ironing produced a bad, shiny effect.  The top makes a great tunic and has good upper arm coverage.
It was exactly has pictured and true to size.

I love the way this blouse looks and fits. The fabric is soft and not too heavy, so it should be great to wear spring, summer, and even in to the fall. The color is a bit brighter than what the picture shows but it is stunning and I can’t wait to wear it!
This is advertised as 100% cotton-it is not cotton. It is some awful synthetic material that does not breath, therefore making the blouse hot to wear.

This blouse is beautiful and the material felt light and soft.The only problem I had with this, is the lining inside the neck would not lay down after it was washed.  If you buy it,  you will most likely need some hem tape or to sew it in place.
This top is beautiful! The colors are vibrant and the material is so soft. I'm very pleased with it.

评论详情: This blouse is much better quality than I expected. The fabric is soft, comfortable and beautifully decorated with embroidery. It’s versatile, too. I bought it to wear with jeans or shorts, but actually tied the bottom at the waist and wore it with a tiered skirt to a party.
This blouse was purchased for my Mom and this an absolute perfection of a blouse. It’s nicely embroidered and a perfect cut. I have purchased two of these blouses for her.

评论概述: Great peasant top for the price.

Wash in cold water, delicate cycle in a garment bag and hang to dry. I steamed the wrinkles out easily with my hand held conair steamer .

This product was as described - all cotton, light weight, embroidered, and very pleasant to wear in hot weather. I receive compliments every time I wear it. I ordered a medium initially which fit but was a bit snug - so returned it for a large which still fits nicely, not too blousy. Very happy with this blouse and highly recommend it!
